example.text: Americans are struggling to pay high energy prices due to President Biden's failed energy policies. Central Washington's all-of-the-above approach is the path towards energy dominance, and the rest of the nation must follow suit. Thanks [[user]] for having me today! [[url]]

View Advaitha's Presentation Here Meeting with the Association of Washington Business This week I was delighted to speak with the Association of Washington Business (AWB) during their fly-in to DC. We discussed some of the work I have been doing in Congress on behalf of Central Washington and how we can continue to work together in the coming year .

By enhancing STEM education in rural schools, we are creating opportunities for Central Washington's students to compete for high-paying jobs and strengthening our international competitiveness. I am proud to represent the hard-working students and teachers of Central Washington, and I look forward to continuing to work to promote rural STEM education in Congress.

Finally, the NIH has disqualified the Wuhan Institute of Virology from receiving any more of our taxpayer dollars! This #CCP lab was responsible for releasing COVID upon the world, and its only right that we no longer fund this corrupt institution. [[url]]

By enhancing STEM education in rural schools, we are creating opportunities for Central Washington's students to compete for high-paying jobs and strengthening our international competitiveness. I am proud to represent the hard-working students and teachers of Central Washington, and I look forward to continuing to work to promote rural STEM education in Congress.

With Title 42 expiring, Mexico has TRIPLED the number of travel visas it usually grants migrants, meaning a large wave will be crossing the border soon. Tackling this crisis is crucial to creating a safe & secure America. We must act before it’s too late. [[url]]

This is why we must ensure rural schools are provided with the tools they need to cultivate the minds and careers of our students. I cosponsored the Broadband for Rural America Act , which invests $43.2 billion in USDA's Rural Development broadband programs by providing last-mile technical and financial assistance to rural communities seeking to improve their broadband service, increasing resources available to build out the middle mile, providing grant funding to small rural communities, and providing funds to invest in distance learning and telemedicine capabilities.
